bug.author: KOLANICH
bug.summary: The docs are unscrollable with JavaScript disabled
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>

<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/stack>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/stack</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>

body[pending] {
	overflow: hidden;
}
should be removed.
<denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>

JS is considered harmful, so the docs should be usable without JS.
The same problem is present in Android and Fuchsia docs.
